Glasgow Paddocks, Doncaster, Yorkshire Prizes - 1st 10 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £6, 4th £4. March contest (own choice) - 1st(£1.10s) Yorkshire Main, 2nd(£1) Manvers Main. Promoted by Royal Infirmary Committee. 8 bands competed.
